# Weft

> AI-powered news aggregator that curates and summarizes the most relevant tech and AI articles.

Weft aggregates RSS feeds from 20+ sources across AI news, major tech publications, thought leaders, design/UX, and company blogs. It uses LLMs to score articles by relevance to user interests and generate summaries.

## Features

- Smart Filter: AI scores articles 1-10 based on user-defined interests
- AI Summaries: Auto-generated via Groq (Llama 3.3 70B) with multiple styles (newsletter, TL;DR, bullets, executive brief)
- Custom Styles: Users can create and save custom summary prompts
- Feed Management: Toggle default feeds on/off, add custom RSS sources
- AI Images: Gemini Imagen generates article illustrations when OG images are missing
- PWA: Installable as app, works offline for cached content

## Default Sources

### Daily News
- The Rundown AI, Hacker News, Last Week in AI, Import AI, The Batch

### Major Publications
- MIT Tech Review, Ars Technica, The Verge AI, Wired AI, VentureBeat AI, TechCrunch AI

### Thought Leaders
- Ethan Mollick (One Useful Thing), Gary Marcus, Zvi Mowshowitz, Interconnects

### Design & UX
- Jakob Nielsen, UX Collective, Nielsen Norman Group

### Company Blogs
- OpenAI, Hugging Face

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: Vanilla JavaScript, CSS custom properties, responsive design
- Backend: Vercel serverless functions (Groq proxy, CORS proxy, Gemini image)
- AI: Groq (Llama 3.3 70B for summaries, Llama 3.1 8B for scoring), Google Gemini Imagen 4.0 for images
- Storage: Browser localStorage

## URL

https://weft-web.vercel.app
